reviews.title: BAD PRODUCT CLIP SHOULD BE USED FOR SHEET PAPER
reviews.review_text: i have had clip fans for many years.. This fan has very little power the clip poor will now clip and hold on anything.. it wold be nice if it had a spiral cord for stretch.. inorder to use i had to redesign with a clip that i had from old fan. poor product...

reviews.title: Weak
reviews.review_text: Weak power Plastic is cheap, i guess i should have checked if it was plastic. Spring doesn't want to hold it upside down...enitre reason i purchased a fan with a clamp.

reviews.title: Flimsy
reviews.review_text: The construction of the fan makes it very delicate. The clip on isn't very strong and falls right off whatever you have it clipped on. Also the adjustment portion of angling the fan itself doesn't stay in position and it just kind of flops over no matter how tight you tighten the screw and nut. I've had a clip on fan before and this one is nowhere near as effective as my first one. I DO NOT recommend this brand!
The fan was crushed and broken by the time it finally arrived.
It's not, it's quite powerful enough for me.It doesn't blow enough air, but then again it is a small fan.
it keeps me cool, but for some reason, the blade tried to fall out of the fan,

reviews.title: Poor construction
reviews.review_text: The screw which holds the clip base onto the fan is not long enough so the wing nut that holds the fan clip on/in place easily falls off.

reviews.title: cheap made and fan LS mot ra
reviews.review_text: clip is madecheap and doesnt hold up

reviews.title: doesn't work right
reviews.review_text: it works terrible. i wish i could have sent it back.
did not receive fan base my first purchase was at a walmart store complete with fan base dissapointed not receiving fan base I like the fan but need the fan base

reviews.title: Poor quality in every way
reviews.review_text: The clip does not hold well to anything so then the fan falls off and then breaks into pieces repeatedly. Buy something higher quality, not this thing. Thanks

reviews.title: Stopped working
reviews.review_text: I would have given 5 stars if not for the fact that it stopped all of a sudden. I purchased 2 of them, one is still working very well. Now I have to figure out what other brand to purchase to replace this fan.

reviews.title: Comfort Zone 6" 2-Speed Portable, Indoor Desk Fan
reviews.review_text: Comfort Zone 6" 2-Speed Portable, Indoor Desk Fan W/Clip, Adjustable Tilt, Rotates 360, White. Pretty much useless for AZ summer weather. My grandson to blow air faster that what this fan puts out. Might be good for a baby room but slots are too far apart %26 could be dangerous. Was just trying to find a bright side for this fan/product. Sorry, but don't recommend.

reviews.title: Just an easy blow of air
reviews.review_text: I purchased this to clip on my treadmill, but it's not very strong, so it doesn't keep me as cool as I would have liked - not even with a second fan there. It was too late to return it, so I brought it to work. This fan is fine for "lighter" cooling uses, like if you're sitting, but not if you need to cool down after a workout.

reviews.title: No working
reviews.review_text: After few weeks After using the fan for about two or three weeks, the low-speed button stopped working. It no longer stays on the low speed, which is really inconvenient. I would like to request a replacement and have a new one sent to me. Thank you!

reviews.title: The fan works good
reviews.review_text: I didn't want a clip fan, I wanted the one with the base, I don't like the clip

reviews.title: cheap toggle switch
reviews.review_text: fan is adequate but toggle switch seems weak and will probably break if mishandled

reviews.title: Short Review After 1 Year
reviews.review_text: I bought 4 of these fans last year (April 2024). All 4 have broken in the same exact spot (the clip that holds them onto whatever you put them on). In my case, I've had all 4 fans on a seedling grow shelf and have never once moved them. 2 of the clips snapped within the first year. And, oddly enough, the other 2 clips snapped within 24 hours of each other (July 17 and 18 of 2025). Definitely not build for long term use.
It's a good little fan but it doesn't clip on unless you have a large ledge and it's not very powerful.

reviews.title: You get what you pay for , quality wise
reviews.review_text: Its very cheap quality! Not worth the money. The only thing worst than one cheap fan is two cheap fans ! Do not buy this

I have bought this several times. Now the boxes do not come with graphics and is a plain brown box. Fan does not push much air. Please put graphics back on boxes and quit being cheap. Does not make a good gift or for storage to know what it is.

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.review_text: When we received the fan it was packaged well and looked like it should. However, when we plugged it in it didn't work. My husband tapped on the fan and then it started to work. So far it has continued to work.

reviews.title: Not!
reviews.review_text: At first worked fine. Tossed the box. In the heat of summer all of a sudden it runs but there isn't any air flow. Have no idea, but not a comfort. Tossed it, if I had the box I Would have returned it. Maybe just this fan but won't buy same brand again to find out. Shame because it was the color, size and had the clip that I wanted and that would have been comforting.

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.review_text: I have about 6 of these, that I have been using for my grow room. First off I've come to realize they don't even blow air which you would think, it is a fan how is that even possible! But, they literally blow no air. Secondly they've been attached to my shelves undisturbed. and they literally have just broken. The clips have literally just broke. They are never moved, touched or anything. I just finally realized that my plants weren't moving and then I felt them and there was no air coming out of them. And then they have just fallen off my shelves. The clips just snap and fall off. These have been the absolute worst fans and an absolute waste of my hard earned money.

reviews.title: Like a steak plate without the steak
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, I didn’t get to use the product. It didn’t work at all, and the fan came without the clip. Kinda like the time I ordered a steak plate at the steakhouse and they gave me a plate without the steak. Lol. Anyway, I won’t purchase again, and wouldn’t recommend to anyone. Maybe you’ll get one that works and comes with the clip or maybe not. But, good luck if you do buy. :) ♡
Not much airflow. Ordered 4 fans, one did not work.
Fan works great. But the clip broke the first week of use.

reviews.title: Works
reviews.review_text: Clip does not hold very well. Fall works really good. I'm happy with it. Just doesn't work in my environment.

reviews.title: MISSING PARTS
reviews.review_text: Missing parts! So now I either go looking for missing parts that should have been included, or start a return...Fans seem okay otherwise.
Please don’t sell this product anymore. The clipping grip isn’t working, it broke easily. Poor design.

reviews.title: Not worth more than $5
reviews.review_text: Better off with a battery powered fan this fan has no power and is straight plastic rubbish from china
Don't waste your money on this fan . You hear vibrations noise no matter where you hook it up to. Doesn't really move the air around much.

reviews.title: Shorting out fan
reviews.review_text: Fans stopped working a couple of weeks after purchase. They turn on and off like there is a short somewhere.

reviews.title: Will the jarred around fan even work!
reviews.review_text: The fan was packed in a box well by the manufacturer, but this box was packed in a large brown shipping box without any packing material. It had to be jarred around as the box was moved. Be amazed if the fan even works!
Dont put out enough air its like haven a person blow on you not a fan
Very little air coming from fan! Very disappointed.

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.review_text: I bought this to replace an old desk fan...this has 2 speeds, low and off. Not worth the money

reviews.title: HORRIBLE!!
reviews.review_text: These are horrible. They create VERY LITTLE air movement. Do not buy! I hate them!

reviews.title: Disappointment
reviews.review_text: Very weak airflow. there was no difference between high and low setting.

reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!
reviews.review_text: Weak fan on one, Other one worked at first, both stopped work after 2 months

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: The fan is too heavy to stay clipped and does not rotate.

reviews.title: Product was dirty
reviews.review_text: Product arrived dirty and with hair stuck in the magnet part of the clip. With all of the virus panic happening right now, that's the last thing I wanted to see.

reviews.title: Misleading ad. Poor description
reviews.review_text: Ordered online, which I hate doing. I like looking at what I'm buying. When received and opened, I was immediately disappointed. The fan guard was a little over 6" and the fan blade was a fraction over 5". Plugged it in and set it to high and could hardly feel the air flow. The ad said 15CM. Nowhere, did the literature describe what 15CM meant. Assuming the meaning meant 15 cubic meters per minute, wrong. Air flow was more like 15 cubic meters per hour. Returned fan for refund.

reviews.title: fan
reviews.review_text: Had to return it. Thought it was oscillating. It was not.

I bought two these in one sitting and one was burn up straight out the box I went to Walmart they said you have to do it online I think itâs pretty sore when you buy something at Walmart.com and you canât even take it back to Walmartï¿¼

reviews.title: My fault, didn’t realize how small the fan is.
reviews.review_text: I know when I ordered this fan that it is small; however, I under estimated the amount of air it would circulate. I’m sure this small fan will work for some people, just not what I needed.

reviews.title: Low level means high level!
reviews.review_text: Not what I expected, will be returning due to high level on the lowest setting. Was planning to use for my daughters bed bunk but is too fast on lower speed, what I need is one that can automatically turns

reviews.title: NOT like they use to be!
reviews.review_text: Motors poop out only after a few weeks use. I've had to order 8 to get maybe 3 "good ones". Whoever is making the motors nowadays is doing a poor job. These use to last forever.

reviews.title: Looking for Clips to replace the ones that broke f
reviews.review_text: This isn't exactly a review I like the fan I have two of them the clip-on 6in but I am trying to find out if I could get replacement clips Unfortunately they do not last long

reviews.title: Ok fan but the clip sucks
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This may be a problem unique to me but i doubt it. I found that although the clip could be plenty wide at times, the gripping power was kind of lacking. Almost no surface in my room would even hold it securely(i can get it on there but the weight would pull it down or a slight knock would). It need to be thin enough but also deep enough for the clip to actually work. Also the cable was too short for my needs. Anywhere near a socket was not able to reliably grip and anywhere it could grip would need an extension cord.
Very small, weak blowing, and doesn't stay locked in place. I would not recommend this product.
The clip Doesn’t have enough non skid dots to keep it from slipping off wherever you clip on

reviews.title: Waste of Money
reviews.review_text: This things keeps stopping and going all by itself....I can hear the motor going out. If I hadn’t trashed the box, I would’ve taken it back. Very disappointed!!!!!!

reviews.title: Money Wasted
reviews.review_text: Disliked everything. Purchased to replace a clip on where the clip broke off. This fan DOES NOT put out any air. What LITTLE air is expelled comes from to top or bottom NOT directly from the front of the fan. A TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY.

reviews.title: Two fans didn't work
reviews.review_text: I purchased two of these fans. I had one in the past that lasted awhile but these two fans neither one works right. Besides being quite noisy, they speed up than slow down continuously! I haven't been able to use them, very disappointing

reviews.title: Clip on fan
reviews.review_text: I don`t think there is enough adjustment and it`s not tight it flops around loose don`t know if I got a bad one or if they are all like this. It`s just ok, I am using it but not satisfied.

reviews.title: Don’t buy this fan
reviews.review_text: It stopped working after 20 minutes of use. I bought two fans the other one is still working

reviews.title: its ok
reviews.review_text: its alright. nothing like the good reviews though. the clip broke in 3 days

reviews.title: Poor reliability
reviews.review_text: Junk- Didn't start when I switched on once in the first 30 days. It has now been a few month longer and it doesn't turn on any more.

reviews.title: Just a few months use
reviews.review_text: Does not last long. Gets slower and slower.

reviews.title: Do not buy!
reviews.review_text: After about 6 months just stopped working!

reviews.title: This fans a piece of junk
reviews.review_text: It's fans a piece of junk I haven't even had it 60 days and it quit working!!!

reviews.title: Bearing bad after a year.
reviews.review_text: Used for night time in a RV, bearing making noises, Purchased 6/19/23 Today is 7/8/24.

reviews.title: Cover does not come off easily to clean
reviews.review_text: Cover does not come off easily to clean. No thanks.
